coded_answer.p: I have won the first prize! I am extremlyextremely happy about this. I am writing because of samesome information that you need.
I havecan only the possibility to taketake a holiday in July because I am going to start a new education at the beginnbeginning of August.
Of course I would like to stay in a tent. When I was a child we were often campingoften camped. To stayStaying in a tent will remind myme of aan unforgottableunforgettable time.

There are a lot of interesting activities and itthat makes it hard to choose only two. Given the circumstances, I would like to learn more about PhotograhyPhotographyphotography and Paintingpainting. I have samesome skills in drawing landscapelandscape drawing but I have no idea about photography. Taking picturepictures is a new experience for me.

I have never been Ito California. How is the weather there in July? What kind of clothes would you recommend taking with me? Is it possible to pay by credit card or should I prefer to taketake travellertravellers' queckescheques?
I am glad to hear from you.
How are you doing? I couldn't write to you because I was very busy.

Last month I enjoyed helping at a pop concert in my town. I applied for a job at the ticket office because I hoppedhoped to see a lot of diffrentdifferent people. You know everybody has to cross this spot!

Given the circumstances, they asked myme for helpingto help in the kitchen. You can imagine how disappointed I was. But it turned out asto be a funnyfun and interesting job. I had to prepare the ingrediansingredients for every meal. ItThat meansmeant I had to read the recipiesrecipes very carefully. And I had to controllcontrolcheck that nothing will bewas missed. The best thing was that I learndlearnedgot a lot of new cooking ideas and I could observe new cooking tricks. On the other hand I had a lot to do and I was never bored. The people were all really funny and we were a good team. The time waswent quickly over and it was a great experience.
And what about you? I am interested to hear about your new dog? Warm whisheswishes
